item.title: Yennai Arindhaal is by far Ajith’s best work: Gautham Menon
item.dc:creator: Only Kollywood
item.description:
Gautham Menon says Yennai Arindhaal is by far Ajith’s best work. Gautham adds there are many applause-worthy moments in the film. “In Arrambam, there is a moment when he looks sharply at someone touching his shoulder. I have loved some of the moments from his earlier films. These are there but the audience will forget they are watching ...

The post Yennai Arindhaal is by far Ajith’s best work: Gautham Menon appeared first on Only Kollywood.
item.content:encoded:
Gautham Menon says Yennai Arindhaal is by far Ajith’s best work. Gautham adds there are many applause-worthy moments in the film. “In Arrambam, there is a moment when he looks sharply at someone touching his shoulder. I have loved some of the moments from his earlier films. These are there but the audience will forget they are watching an Ajith film 15 minutes into it,” says Gautham Menon.

“I have made a couple of bold moves in this film, which is in the modern space. Even though we haven’t shown anything happening and it has been left to the audience’s imagination,” adds Gautham.

Yennai Arindhaal is slated for worldwide release tomorrow and the world’s first premiere is scheduled to happen tonight in Dubai at 12 AM IST.

The post Yennai Arindhaal is by far Ajith’s best work: Gautham Menon appeared first on Only Kollywood.

item.title: Ajith thinks Yennai Arindhaal is really good: Dan Macarthur
item.dc:creator: Only Kollywood
item.description:
There is a lot of buzz and euphoria around Yennai Arindhaal from various quarters. Australian cinematographer Dan Macarthur has taken to his official social media page and revealed what Ajith has told him after watching the film. “Have fun tomw #thala fans! Ill be watching the film in Brisbane. Ajith told me he thinks the film is ...

The post Ajith thinks Yennai Arindhaal is really good: Dan Macarthur appeared first on Only Kollywood.
item.content:encoded:
There is a lot of buzz and euphoria around Yennai Arindhaal from various quarters. Australian cinematographer Dan Macarthur has taken to his official social media page and revealed what Ajith has told him after watching the film. “Have fun tomw #thala fans! Ill be watching the film in Brisbane. Ajith told me he thinks the film is really good ,” posted Dan.

The early morning shows are starting as early as around 4 AM in Chennai and the world’s first premiere show will happen tonight at 12 AM IST in Dubai. Stay tuned to Only Kollywood for the first-on-net review of the film!

The post Ajith thinks Yennai Arindhaal is really good: Dan Macarthur appeared first on Only Kollywood.

item.title: Vishal Dadlani croons Vikram’s intro song in 10 Enradhukulla
item.dc:creator: Only Kollywood
item.description:
Popular Bollywood singer Vishal Dadlani has recorded a song for Imman in the Vikram and Samantha-starrer 10 Enradhukulla directed by Vijay Milton. This is said to be Vikram’s introduction song in the film and a peppy rock number. “The song is a stylish number. It will be picturized in lavish James Bond style,” says Vijay Milton. ...

The post Vishal Dadlani croons Vikram’s intro song in 10 Enradhukulla appeared first on Only Kollywood.
item.content:encoded:
Popular Bollywood singer Vishal Dadlani has recorded a song for Imman in the Vikram and Samantha-starrer 10 Enradhukulla directed by Vijay Milton. This is said to be Vikram’s introduction song in the film and a peppy rock number. “The song is a stylish number. It will be picturized in lavish James Bond style,” says Vijay Milton.

There are totally five songs in the film and Vijay Milton has already completed shooting three of them. The team is planning to head to Nepal for their next schedule. Samantha will be part of this schedule and in fact, she will be seen throughout the film. The shooting is likely to be wrapped up in March.

 

The post Vishal Dadlani croons Vikram’s intro song in 10 Enradhukulla appeared first on Only Kollywood.

item.title: Amala Paul signs Pandiraj’s next?
item.dc:creator: Only Kollywood
item.description:
Amala Paul, who was last seen in Parthiepan’s Kathai Thiraikathai Vasanam Iyakkam, has signed her first Tamil film after marriage if sources are meant to be trusted. Sources say she will play a significant role in Pandiraj’s next film for Suriya’s production banner 2D Entertainment. The film also Bindhu Madhavi in an important role. Featuring young kids ...

The post Amala Paul signs Pandiraj’s next? appeared first on Only Kollywood.
item.content:encoded:
Amala Paul, who was last seen in Parthiepan’s Kathai Thiraikathai Vasanam Iyakkam, has signed her first Tamil film after marriage if sources are meant to be trusted. Sources say she will play a significant role in Pandiraj’s next film for Suriya’s production banner 2D Entertainment. The film also Bindhu Madhavi in an important role.

Featuring young kids between five and seven, the film also has Suriya in a special cameo appearance. Suriya earlier said in an interview that this film could be an eye-opener for Tamil cinema like Aamir Khan’s Taare Zameen Par.

The post Amala Paul signs Pandiraj’s next? appeared first on Only Kollywood.

item.title: Sandra Amy joins Simha’s Urumeen
item.dc:creator: Only Kollywood
item.description:
Sandra Amy, who was last seen in Dharani, will play one of the characters in Bobby Simha’s Urumeen directed by Sakthivel Perumalsamy. She is playing Bobby Simha’s friend in the film and joined the team yesterday. “I am excited to play this role as it has the scope to perform. My character is bold, tomboyish girl named Jennifer,” says Sandra. ...

The post Sandra Amy joins Simha’s Urumeen appeared first on Only Kollywood.
item.content:encoded:
Sandra Amy, who was last seen in Dharani, will play one of the characters in Bobby Simha’s Urumeen directed by Sakthivel Perumalsamy. She is playing Bobby Simha’s friend in the film and joined the team yesterday. “I am excited to play this role as it has the scope to perform. My character is bold, tomboyish girl named Jennifer,” says Sandra.

Produced by Axes Film Factory, Urumeen also has Kalaiarasan of Madras fame in a pivotal role and Reshmi Menon of Burma as Simha’s love-interest.

The post Sandra Amy joins Simha’s Urumeen appeared first on Only Kollywood.

item.title: Varalaxmi Sarathkumar’s unintimidated commitment moves Bala
item.dc:creator: Only Kollywood
item.description:
Bala has been blown away by Varalaxmi Sarathkumar’s unintimidated commitment for a scene in Thaarai Thappattai. There is a crucial scene in the film where Varu has to be assaulted violently by a group of baddies in a murder attempt. Varalaxmi has apparently broken her collar bone and later she realized it got dislocated when she underwent medical ...

The post Varalaxmi Sarathkumar’s unintimidated commitment moves Bala appeared first on Only Kollywood.
item.content:encoded:
Bala has been blown away by Varalaxmi Sarathkumar’s unintimidated commitment for a scene in Thaarai Thappattai. There is a crucial scene in the film where Varu has to be assaulted violently by a group of baddies in a murder attempt. Varalaxmi has apparently broken her collar bone and later she realized it got dislocated when she underwent medical treatment. But, she has never revealed this to Bala and continued her work.

After becoming aware of the accident, Bala was moved to tears and gifted Varu an expensive gold chain which he was wearing on the spot. The team is currently shooting in Thanjavur and Ilaiyaraja is visiting the sets today. Bala and team are planning a grand reception for the Maestro.

The post Varalaxmi Sarathkumar’s unintimidated commitment moves Bala appeared first on Only Kollywood.

item.title: Masss to hit screens in May?
item.dc:creator: Only Kollywood
item.description:
Suriya’S Masss directed by Venkat Prabhu is progressing at a swift pace and the team has completed nearly more than half of shoot already. The latest update is the makers are planning to release the film in May to pull in more family audiences and school-going kids who will be on summer vacation. Produced by Studio Greeen, Masss ...

The post Masss to hit screens in May? appeared first on Only Kollywood.
item.content:encoded:
Suriya’S Masss directed by Venkat Prabhu is progressing at a swift pace and the team has completed nearly more than half of shoot already. The latest update is the makers are planning to release the film in May to pull in more family audiences and school-going kids who will be on summer vacation.

Produced by Studio Greeen, Masss is said to be a entertaining horror-comedy with a mix of genres and has Suriya, Nayanthara and Pranitha in the lead. It also has Samuthirakani, Parthiepan, Madhu Sudhan, Sreeman and Karunas in important roles.

The post Masss to hit screens in May? appeared first on Only Kollywood.

item.title: OFFICIAL: Dhanush and Prabhu Solomon to join hands
item.dc:creator: Only Kollywood
item.description:
We earlier reported here that Dhanush will join hands with Prabhu Solomon for his next. Now, it’s official. Dhanush, who is currently busy shooting Balaji Mohan’s Maari, has signed his next film for the production house Sathya Jyothi Films under the direction of Prabhu Solomon. This marks Sathya Jyothi Films’ 30th film in the industry. The film is ...

The post OFFICIAL: Dhanush and Prabhu Solomon to join hands appeared first on Only Kollywood.
item.content:encoded:
We earlier reported here that Dhanush will join hands with Prabhu Solomon for his next. Now, it’s official. Dhanush, who is currently busy shooting Balaji Mohan’s Maari, has signed his next film for the production house Sathya Jyothi Films under the direction of Prabhu Solomon. This marks Sathya Jyothi Films’ 30th film in the industry. The film is said to be a big-budget action entertainer. Imman will compose music and V Mahendran will crank the camera. Other cast details, including the female lead, are yet to be decided.

Dhanush already has an yet-to-be-titled film film with Velraj under his banner Wunderbar Films and Vetrimaaran’s Soodhadi under his kitty.

The post OFFICIAL: Dhanush and Prabhu Solomon to join hands appeared first on Only Kollywood.

item.title: Yennai Arindhaal is Ajith’s best pre-release business
item.dc:creator: Only Kollywood
item.description:
The pre-release business numbers of Yennai Arindhaal are out and it indicates that it is Ajith’s best after Arrambam. The film has earned a worldwide theatricals of around 50 crores sans Telugu rights and ancillary revenues including music rights and satellite rights. Ajith’s Arrambam earned a worldwide pre-release theatrical business of 48 crores. Yennai Arindhaal has been sold for Rs. 35 crores in ...

The post Yennai Arindhaal is Ajith’s best pre-release business appeared first on Only Kollywood.
item.content:encoded:
The pre-release business numbers of Yennai Arindhaal are out and it indicates that it is Ajith’s best after Arrambam. The film has earned a worldwide theatricals of around 50 crores sans Telugu rights and ancillary revenues including music rights and satellite rights. Ajith’s Arrambam earned a worldwide pre-release theatrical business of 48 crores. Yennai Arindhaal has been sold for Rs. 35 crores in Tamil Nadu and to break even, the film has to earn a minimum of 80 crores in Tamil Nadu and join the 100-crore grossers list worldwide.

Meanwhile, the latest buzz is midnight shows scheduled in various theatres in the city have been cancelled and the first show is likely to happen early morning in the city.

The post Yennai Arindhaal is Ajith’s best pre-release business appeared first on Only Kollywood.
